arts.sum: Leverkusen appeared to have struck a decisive blow after Stark fouled Christian Kofane to incur a second yellow card and Schick calmly scored from the resulting penalty. Coulibaly had been at fault as Bremen grabbed the lead after five minutes.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen stun Bayer Leverkusen with unlikeliest of comebacks
arts.sum: Werder Bremen appeared set for a third-straight competitive loss in 2025/26, until the 10-man hosts dramatically pegged back visiting Bayer Leverkusen, for whom Patrik Schick had netted an earlier double. Patrik Schick got off the mark in this season's Bundesliga with an early goal in Bremen.

arts.ttl: Ten Hag’s Leverkusen collapse as 10-man Werder Bremen snatch late point
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen squandered a two-goal lead against 10-man Werder Bremen in a thrilling 3-3 draw at the Weserstadion.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Werder Bremen 3-3 Bayer Leverkusen – SVW fight back to record memorable comeback
arts.sum: Werder Bremen fought like lions to pick up a valuable point against Bayer Leverkusen at the Weserstadion in the Bundesliga on Saturday afternoon. Abdoul Coulibaly – at fault for Leverkusen’s…

arts.ttl: Bundesliga Preview | Werder Bremen vs Bayer Leverkusen – Both go in search for first points
arts.sum: Werder Bremen host Bayer Leverkusen at the Weserstadion in the Bundesliga Konferenz on Saturday afternoon with the two clubs looking for their first points of the season. Both clubs are…

arts.sum: GGFN are fresh from the Bayer Leverkusen press conference as Erik ten Hag goes in search of his first win in the Bundesliga. Ahead of B04’s away game at Werder…

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen vs Bayer Leverkusen preview: Two teams in need of a win
arts.sum: It feels like the loser of this game will be in a really bad spot going forward.
